div.h2: US Core CarePlan Category Extension Codes

div.p: Set of codes that are needed for implementation of the US-Core profiles. These codes are used as extensions to the FHIR and US Core value sets.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CodeSystem/careplan-category defines the following codes:
